name: AquaVelva
description:
I've done this animation for the AGDG Game Jam #01.
Actually, I wanted to do a little more, like playable stuff but I ran out of time. I even began during the middle of the jam because I was working on another GameJam...

I 'll try to add some content later.

2017-04-02 Update :
I just release the new version. There is a way to give food to the fish with the left click mouse. And there is a background music.

Mad World - Gary Jules
